諲字的基本解释

諲
yīn
敬。

諲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīn］
［《廣韻》於真切，平真，影。］
(1)敬。
(2)用作人名。《新唐书·肃宗纪》有兵部侍郎吕諲。
(3)用同“殷”。参见“諲實”。

諲字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諲； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1171第11
【唐韻】於眞切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】伊眞切，?音因。【爾雅·釋詁】敬也。　又人名。【南齊書】太常丞何諲之。【唐書】大都督長史呂諲。　又【玉篇】之神切【集韻】之人切，?音眞。義同。　【集韻】或作㖶。

諲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
諲字的起名意思

敬。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
yīn
Respectfully.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīn］
["Guangyun" is true, plain, and shadowy. ]
(1) Respect.
(2) Used as a person's name. "New Tang Book·Suzong Ji" has Lv Kun, the minister of war.
(3) Use the same as "Yin". See "Xinshi".
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　諲; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1171 to 11
【Tang Yun】Yu Xuqie【Jiyun】【Yunhui】【Zhengyun】Yinqie,? Yinyin. 【Erya·Shigu】Respect.　Another name. [Southern Qi Book] Taichang Cheng He Yunzhi. [Book of Tang] Governor-General Shi Lu Kun.　 Also [Jade Chapter] God cut [Jiyun] people cut,? Yin 眞. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】or make 㖶.
